title: Essential Neuroscience (3rd Ed)(gnv64)
description:
Essential Neuroscience (3rd Ed) 
by Dr. Allan Siegel PhD and Dr. Hreday N. Sapru PhD 
LWW | June 2014 | ISBN-10: 1451189680 | True PDF | 608 pages | 43.7 mb

Help your students master the fundamentals of neuroscience and prepare for board and course exams with Essential Neuroscience, 3e. This student-friendly book uses a stepwise approach that starts with the basic building blocks of neural anatomy and expands to cover structures and functions, the interaction of systems, and the science of clinical disorders.  
Offering concise, clinically relevant coverage, this proven book uses a well-balanced mix of anatomy, physiology, biology, and biochemistry to help your students increase their conceptual understanding of the subject matter and prepare for course and board exams.
The Third Edition is enhanced by new MRIs and case studies, updated art and review questions, and online teaching and learning resources, including an image bank for instructors and an interactive Quiz Bank and an online glossary for students.
